name: FG Costing
query:
select
/*f.posting_date,*/
f.item_code as "Item Code",
f.item_name as "Item Name",
f.product_category as "Product Category",
f.price_category as "Price Category",
f.category as "Category",
f.item_sub_group as "Item Sub Group",
f.company as "Company",
TRUNCATE(f.aq,2) as "Produced Qty",
f.b as "Produced Qty (In kg)",
f.c as "Produced Qty RM Value",
/*f.oc,
f.tq,*/
TRUNCATE(((f.oc*f.b)/f.tq),2) as "Allocated Overhead Cost",
TRUNCATE((f.c+((f.oc*f.b)/f.tq)),2) as "Total Cost",
TRUNCATE(((f.c+((f.oc*f.b)/f.tq))/f.b),2) as "Rate Per kg",
TRUNCATE(fg.g,2) as "Closing Stock",
TRUNCATE((((f.c+((f.oc*f.b)/f.tq))/f.b)*fg.g),2) as "Closing Stock Value"
from


(select 
ab.item_name,
ab.product_category,
ab.price_category,
ab.category,
ab.item_sub_group,
ab.posting_date,
ab.item_code,
ab.aq,
ab.kg as "b",
ab.sv as "c",
ab.company,
ab.oc,
c.aqq as "tq"
from


(select
a.item_name,
a.product_category,
a.price_category,
a.category,
a.item_sub_group,
a.posting_date,
a.item_code,
a.aq,
a.sv,
a.kg,
a.company,
b.oc
from

(select 
sle.posting_date,
sle.item_code,
sum(sle.actual_qty) as "aq",
sum(sle.stock_value) as "sv",
((sum(sle.actual_qty))*itm.weight_per_box)/1000 as "kg",
sle.company,
sle.name,
itm.item_name,
itm.product_category,
itm.price_category,
itm.category,
itm.item_sub_group
from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as sle left join `tabStock Entry` as se 
on se.name=sle.voucher_no
left join `tabItem` as itm
on itm.item_code=sle.item_code
where se.stock_entry_type="Manufacture" and sle.voucher_type="Stock Entry"  and sle.incoming_rate>0 and itm.item_group="Finished Goods"
and (sle.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s)
group by sle.company,sle.warehouse,itm.item_name) as a

left join

(select
gl.account,
gl.company,
sum(gl.debit-gl.credit) as "oc"
from `tabGL Entry` as gl left join `tabAccount` as ac
on gl.account=ac.name
where (ac.overhead_expense=1 or ac.is_pvc_ledger=1) and (gl.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s)
group by gl.company) as b
on a.company=b.company) as ab 
left join

(select 
sle.item_code,
sum((sle.actual_qty*itm.weight_per_box)/1000) as "aqq",
sum(sle.stock_value),
sle.company,
sle.name
from `tabStock Ledger Entry` as sle left join `tabStock Entry` as se 
on se.name=sle.voucher_no
left join `tabItem` as itm
on itm.item_code=sle.item_code
where se.stock_entry_type="Manufacture" and sle.voucher_type="Stock Entry"  and sle.incoming_rate>0 and itm.item_group="Finished Goods"
and (sle.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s)
group by sle.company) as c 
on ab.company=c.company) as f
left join

(select 
item_code,
company,
sum(actual_qty) as "g"
from `tabStock Ledger Entry`
group by item_code,company) as fg
on fg.company=f.company and fg.item_code=f.item_code
where (date(f.posting_date) between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s)
